title: New Fireworks Law Now in Effect: Let’s Keep This Fourth Safe!
content: July 2, 2025Governor Green has signed HB 1483 into law, making it easier for police to enforce fireworks regulations with stricter penalties. Let’s ensure a safe and happy Fourth of July! For […]
